item.description: Dim sum is fun. We sit at a round table and choose and share our food as people come by with steam carts full of deliciousness. Chau Chow City is the best dim sum place in Chinatown. I know from personal experience growing up and going to all the different dim sum places in Boston. Dim sum is a filling experience. We suggest you have a light dinner the night before. If anyone wants to, we can take a tour of Chinatown afterwards.
item.name: Dim Sum in Chinatown
